attributes.action: Give our armed forces first rate medical treatment and pensions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
our soldiers wounded while on duty  - or discharged from the miltary because of illness - are shamefully dumped at the back of the queue for medical treatment and paid second-rate pensions.
we ask the prime minister to give the soldiers the first class medical care and pensions they deserve
